item.title: network
item.description: evil-winrm # get shell via evil-winrm ./evil-winrm.rb -u username -p password -i target-ip ssh / tunneling # create ssh-key ssh-keygen add public-key to authorized_keys cat rsa.pub >> authorized_keys set permission on private-key chmod 600 id_rsa login via ssh-key ssh -i id_rsa username@target-ip login with older ciphers ssh -oKexAlgorithms=+diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 -c aes128-cbc username@target-ip start tool after ssh login ssh username@target-ip -o "ProxyCommand=ncat --proxy-type http --proxy target-ip:proxy-port 127.0.0.1 22" ssh port forwarding
